column1: Having many system similarities to Full Metal Planète, Terrain Vague is a war game-ish game based on young gangs of kids fighting over turf in a junk yard. Imagine an R-rated Little Rascals movie with weapons and you get the idea.<br/><br/>A winner of the 1992 Concours International de Créateurs de Jeux de Société.<br/><br/>
